channel.title: Konrad Adenauer specials
channel.description:
Special programming commemorating the life of Konrad Adenauer, chancellor of West Germany from 1949 to 1963.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: The Adenauer era
item.description: An overview of the period when Karl Adenauer was chancellor of West Germany.
item.dc:creator: Deutsche Welle
item.dc:subject: Adenauer, Konrad, 1876-1967.

item.title: Adenauer: Thoughts on democracy
item.description: This program presents excerpts from Karl Adenauer's "Thoughts on Democracy."
item.dc:creator: Adenauer, Konrad, 1876-1967.
item.dc:subject: Adenauer, Konrad, 1876-1967.

item.title: Adenauer obituary
item.description: This program presents an obituary of German statesman, Karl Adenauer.
